    Momapy

    momapy

    Library for working with molecular maps programmatically

    Modules:

    Name Description
    builder

    Classes and functions for building maps and map elements
    celldesigner

    Subpackage for CellDesigner maps
    coloring

    Classes and objects for defining colors
    core

    Base classes for core components defining maps and their elements
    drawing

    Classes and objects for drawing elements (SVG-like)
    geometry

    Classes and functions for geometry
    io

    Base classes and functions for reading and writing maps
    meta
    monitoring
    positioning

    Functions for positioning layout elements and related objects relatively to other objects
    rendering

    Subpackage for rendering
    sbgn

    Subpackage for SBGN maps
    sbml

    Subpackge for SBML maps (skeleton)
    styling

    Classes and functions for styling layout elements using style sheets
    Made with Material for MkDocs
